00055 //Ensure we're using a valid joystick driver
00056 #ifndef JS_VERSION
00057 #error "JS_VERSION undefined"
00058 #else
00059 #if (JS_VERSION < 0x010000)
00060 #error "JS_VERSION too low"
00061 #endif
00062 #endif

00078 TeleopSourceJoystick::TeleopSourceJoystick() :
00079   mIsInitialised(false),
00080   mDevice(getDefaultDevice()),
00081   mJoystickName(std::string("none")),
00082   mFileDescriptor(-1),
00083   mNumAxes(0),
00084   mNumButtons(0) {
00085   //Initialise array members
00086   for (int i = 0; i < ABS_CNT; i++) {
00087     mAxisMap[i] = ABS_MISC;
00088   }
00089   for (int i = 0; i < KEY_MAX - BTN_MISC + 1; i++) {
00090     mButtonMap[i] = BTN_MISC;
00091   }
00092 }
00093 //=============================================================================
00094 TeleopSourceJoystick::~TeleopSourceJoystick() {
00095   //Shutdown (should always succeed)
00096   if (!shutdown()) {
00097     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::~TeleopSourceJoystick: warning: ignoring error in shutdown\n");
00098   }
00099 }
00100 //=============================================================================
00101 bool TeleopSourceJoystick::setDevice(std::string device) {
00102   //Lock access to members
00103   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> memberLock(mMemberMutex);
00104 
00105   //Set device
00106   mDevice = device;
00107 
00108   //Return result
00109   return true;
00110 }
00111 //=============================================================================
00112 std::string TeleopSourceJoystick::getDevice() {
00113   //Lock access to members
00114   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> memberLock(mMemberMutex);
00115 
00116   //Return device
00117   return mDevice;
00118 }
00119 //=============================================================================
00120 std::string TeleopSourceJoystick::getJoystickName() {
00121   //Lock access to members
00122   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> memberLock(mMemberMutex);
00123 
00124   //Return joystick name
00125   return mJoystickName;
00126 }
00127 //=============================================================================
00128 bool TeleopSourceJoystick::init() {
00129   //Lock access to members
00130   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> memberLock(mMemberMutex);
00131 
00132   //If already initialised shutdown first (shutdown should always succeed)
00133   if (mIsInitialised && !shutdown()) {
00134     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::init: warning: ignoring error in shutdown\n");
00135   }
00136 
00137   //If device is already open something is wrong
00138   if (-1 != mFileDescriptor) {
00139     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::init: error: device already open\n");
00140     return false;
00141   }
00142 
00143   //Open device in non-blocking mode.  We then close and open the device again
00144   //to address driver issues which sometimes cause initialisation events to be
00145   //incorrect.
00146   mFileDescriptor = open(mDevice.c_str(), O_RDONLY | O_NONBLOCK);
00147   if (-1 == mFileDescriptor) {
00148     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::init: error: could not open device (%s, %d)\n", mDevice.c_str(), errno);
00149     return false;
00150   }
00151   if (0 != close(mFileDescriptor)) {
00152     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::init: error: could not close device (%d)\n", errno);
00153     mFileDescriptor = -1;
00154     return false;
00155   }
00156   mFileDescriptor = open(mDevice.c_str(), O_RDONLY | O_NONBLOCK);
00157   if (-1 == mFileDescriptor) {
00158     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::init: error: could not re-open device (%s, %d)\n", mDevice.c_str(), errno);
00159     return false;
00160   }
00161 
00162   //Get number of axes and buttons and corresponding maps
00163   if (0 > ioctl(mFileDescriptor, JSIOCGAXES, &mNumAxes)) {
00164     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::init: error: could not read number of axes (%d)\n", errno);
00165     close(mFileDescriptor);
00166     mFileDescriptor = -1;
00167     return false;
00168   }
00169   if (0 > ioctl(mFileDescriptor, JSIOCGAXMAP, mAxisMap)) {
00170     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::init: error: could not read axis map (%d)\n", errno);
00171     close(mFileDescriptor);
00172     mFileDescriptor = -1;
00173     return false;
00174   }
00175   if (0 > ioctl(mFileDescriptor, JSIOCGBUTTONS, &mNumButtons)) {
00176     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::init: error: could not read number of buttons (%d)\n", errno);
00177     close(mFileDescriptor);
00178     mFileDescriptor = -1;
00179     return false;
00180   }
00181   if (0 > ioctl(mFileDescriptor, JSIOCGBTNMAP, mButtonMap)) {
00182     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::init: error: could not read button map (%d)\n", errno);
00183     close(mFileDescriptor);
00184     mFileDescriptor = -1;
00185     return false;
00186   }
00187 
00188   //Get joystick name
00189   char name[128];
00190   if (0 > ioctl(mFileDescriptor, JSIOCGNAME(sizeof(name)), name)) {
00191     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::init: error: could not read name (%d)\n", errno);
00192     close(mFileDescriptor);
00193     mFileDescriptor = -1;
00194     return false;
00195   }
00196   mJoystickName = std::string(name);
00197 
00198   //Print joystick info
00199   fprintf(stdout, "Device file:  %s\n", mDevice.c_str());
00200   fprintf(stdout, "Device name:  %s\n", mJoystickName.c_str());
00201   fprintf(stdout, "Num axes:     %u\n", mNumAxes);
00202   for (int i = 0; i < mNumAxes; i++) {
00203     fprintf(stdout, "  axis[%2d]   = 0x%04x -> %04d -> %s\n",
00204             i,
00205             mAxisMap[i],
00206             axisDriverTypeToTeleopType(mAxisMap[i]),
00207             teleopAxisName(axisDriverTypeToTeleopType(mAxisMap[i])).c_str());
00208   }
00209   fprintf(stdout, "Num buttons:  %u\n", mNumButtons);
00210   for (int i = 0; i < mNumButtons; i++) {
00211     fprintf(stdout, "  button[%2d] = 0x%04x -> %04d -> %s\n",
00212             i,
00213             mButtonMap[i],
00214             buttonDriverTypeToTeleopType(mButtonMap[i]),
00215             teleopButtonName(buttonDriverTypeToTeleopType(mButtonMap[i])).c_str());
00216   }
00217 
00218   //Print welcome message
00219   fprintf(stdout, "\n\nJoystick is ready.  Press CTRL-C to quit.\n");
00220 
00221   //Note that we're prepared
00222   mIsInitialised = true;
00223 
00224   //Return success
00225   return true;
00226 }
00227 //=============================================================================
00228 bool TeleopSourceJoystick::listen(unsigned int listenTimeout, TeleopState* const teleopState, bool* updated) {
00229   //Set default value
00230   *updated = false;
00231 
00232   //Sanity check
00233   if (NULL == teleopState) {
00234     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::listen: error: NULL teleop state\n");
00235     return false;
00236   }
00237 
00238   //Lock access to members
00239   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> memberLock(mMemberMutex);
00240 
00241   //Ensure we're initialised
00242   if (!mIsInitialised) {
00243     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::listen: error: not initialised\n");
00244     return false;
00245   }
00246 
00247   //Ensure state has correct number and types of axes and buttons
00248   if (teleopState->axes.size() != mNumAxes) {
00249     teleopState->axes.resize(mNumAxes);
00250     for (size_t i = 0; i < teleopState->axes.size(); i++) {
00251       teleopState->axes[i].type = axisDriverTypeToTeleopType(mAxisMap[i]);
00252       teleopState->axes[i].value = 0.0;
00253     }
00254   }
00255   if (teleopState->buttons.size() != mNumButtons) {
00256     teleopState->buttons.resize(mNumButtons);
00257     for (size_t i = 0; i < teleopState->buttons.size(); i++) {
00258       teleopState->buttons[i].type = buttonDriverTypeToTeleopType(mButtonMap[i]);
00259       teleopState->buttons[i].value = 0;
00260     }
00261   }
00262 
00263   //Initialise a file descriptor set for select
00264   fd_set fileDescriptorSet;
00265   FD_ZERO (&fileDescriptorSet);
00266   FD_SET (mFileDescriptor, &fileDescriptorSet);
00267 
00268   //Initialise timeout value for select
00269   struct timeval timeout;
00270   timeout.tv_sec = listenTimeout / 1000;
00271   timeout.tv_usec = (listenTimeout % 1000) * 1000;
00272 
00273   //Use select to see if anything shows up before timeout
00274   int result = select(FD_SETSIZE, &fileDescriptorSet, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
00275   if (0 == result) {
00276     //Timeout
00277     return true;
00278   } else if (-1 == result) {
00279     //Error
00280     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::listen: error: select() failed (%d)\n", errno);
00281     return false;
00282   }
00283 
00284   //Data available, read and process all events until queue is empty
00285   js_event event;
00286   while (true) {
00287     //Read one event (recall that file was opened in non-blocking mode)
00288     ssize_t numBytes = read(mFileDescriptor, &event, sizeof(js_event));
00289     if ((-1 == numBytes) && (EAGAIN == errno)) {
00290       //Queue is empty
00291       return true;
00292     } else if (sizeof(js_event) == numBytes) {
00293       //Handle this event
00294       if (!handleEvent(&event, teleopState, updated)) {
00295         fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::listen: error: handleEvent() failed\n");
00296         return false;
00297       }
00298     } else if (-1 == numBytes) {
00299       //Error other than EAGAIN
00300       fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::listen: error: read() failed (%d)\n", errno);
00301       return false;
00302     } else {
00303       //Error in number of bytes read
00304       fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::listen: error: read() did not read enough bytes (read %ld)\n", numBytes);
00305       return false;
00306     }
00307   }
00308 }
00309 //=============================================================================
00310 bool TeleopSourceJoystick::shutdown() {
00311   //Lock access to members
00312   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> memberLock(mMemberMutex);
00313 
00314   //If we're not prepared we're done.  This means this method can be called
00315   //multiple times without problems.
00316   if (!mIsInitialised) {
00317     return true;
00318   }
00319 
00320   //Print error message if device is not open or if we can't close it, but
00321   //either way we keep going and clean up as best we can.
00322   if (-1 == mFileDescriptor) {
00323     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::shutdown: warning: device not open\n");
00324   } else if (0 != close(mFileDescriptor)) {
00325     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::shutdown: warning: problem closing device (%d)\n", errno);
00326   }
00327 
00328   //Restore default values
00329   mIsInitialised = false;
00330   mJoystickName = std::string("none");
00331   mFileDescriptor = -1;
00332   mNumAxes = 0;
00333   mNumButtons = 0;
00334 
00335   //Return success
00336   return true;
00337 }
00338 //=============================================================================
00339 bool TeleopSourceJoystick::handleEvent(const js_event* const event, TeleopState* const teleopState, bool* updated) {
00340   //Handle known events
00341   switch(event->type)
00342   {
00343     case JS_EVENT_AXIS | JS_EVENT_INIT:
00344     case JS_EVENT_AXIS:
00345       //Event number shouldn't be bigger than the vector
00346       if(event->number >= teleopState->axes.size()) {
00347         fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::handleEvent: error: invalid axis event number\n");
00348         return false;
00349       }
00350 
00351       //Set value for this event and signal update
00352       teleopState->axes[event->number].value = axisDriverValueToTeleopValue(event->value);
00353 
00354       //By default X and Y axes are positive right and down, respectively.  We
00355       //would like them to be positive up and left.  The axes are switched in
00356       //the axisDriverTypeToTeleopType() method, and the directions are
00357       //inverted internally here.  Other axes which have counter-intuitive
00358       //directions are inverted here as well.
00359       switch (teleopState->axes[event->number].type) {
00360         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_LIN_X:
00361         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_LIN_Y:
00362         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_LIN_Z:
00363         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_ROT_X:
00364         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_ROT_Y:
00365         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_ROT_Z:
00366         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT0_X:
00367         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT0_Y:
00368         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT1_X:
00369         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT1_Y:
00370         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT2_X:
00371         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT2_Y:
00372         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT3_X:
00373         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT3_Y:
00374         case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_THROTTLE:
00375           teleopState->axes[event->number].value *= -1.0;
00376           break;
00377         default:
00378           //Ignore other axes
00379           break;
00380       }
00381       *updated = true;
00382       return true;
00383 
00384     case JS_EVENT_BUTTON | JS_EVENT_INIT:
00385     case JS_EVENT_BUTTON:
00386       //Event number shouldn't be bigger than the vector
00387       if(event->number >= teleopState->buttons.size()) {
00388         fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceJoystick::handleEvent: error: invalid button event number\n");
00389         return false;
00390       }
00391       //Set value for this event and signal update
00392       teleopState->buttons[event->number].value = buttonDriverValueToTeleopValue(event->value);
00393       *updated = true;
00394       return true;
00395     default:
00396       //Unknown event type, no change
00397       return true;
00398   }
00399 }
00400 //=============================================================================
00401 TeleopAxisValue TeleopSourceJoystick::axisDriverValueToTeleopValue(__s16 axisValue) {
00402   return (TeleopAxisValue)(axisValue)/32767.0;
00403 }
00404 //=============================================================================
00405 TeleopButtonValue TeleopSourceJoystick::buttonDriverValueToTeleopValue(__s16 buttonValue) {
00406   return (TeleopButtonValue)buttonValue;
00407 }
00408 //=============================================================================
00409 TeleopAxisType TeleopSourceJoystick::axisDriverTypeToTeleopType(__u8 axisType) {
00410   switch (axisType) {
00411     //By default X and Y axes are positive right and down, respectively.  We
00412     //would like them to be positive up and left.  Relevant axes are therefore
00413     //switched here.  The directions are switched in the handleEvent() method.
00414     case ABS_X:         return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_LIN_Y;
00415     case ABS_Y:         return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_LIN_X;
00416     case ABS_Z:         return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_LIN_Z;
00417     case ABS_RX:        return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_ROT_X;
00418     case ABS_RY:        return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_ROT_Y;
00419     case ABS_RZ:        return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_ROT_Z;
00420     case ABS_HAT0X:     return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT0_Y;
00421     case ABS_HAT0Y:     return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT0_X;
00422     case ABS_HAT1X:     return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT1_Y;
00423     case ABS_HAT1Y:     return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT1_X;
00424     case ABS_HAT2X:     return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT2_Y;
00425     case ABS_HAT2Y:     return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT2_X;
00426     case ABS_HAT3X:     return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT3_Y;
00427     case ABS_HAT3Y:     return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_HAT3_X;
00428     case ABS_TILT_X:    return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_ROT_X;
00429     case ABS_TILT_Y:    return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_ROT_Y;
00430     case ABS_GAS:
00431     case ABS_THROTTLE:  return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_THROTTLE;
00432   }
00433   return TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_UNKNOWN;
00434 }
00435 //=============================================================================
00436 TeleopButtonType TeleopSourceJoystick::buttonDriverTypeToTeleopType(__u16 buttonType) {
00437   switch (buttonType) {
00438     case BTN_0:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_0;
00439     case BTN_1:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_1;
00440     case BTN_2:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_2;
00441     case BTN_3:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_3;
00442     case BTN_4:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_4;
00443     case BTN_5:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_5;
00444     case BTN_6:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_6;
00445     case BTN_7:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_7;
00446     case BTN_8:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_8;
00447     case BTN_9:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_9;
00448     case BTN_A:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_A;
00449     case BTN_B:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_B;
00450     case BTN_C:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_C;
00451     case BTN_X:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_X;
00452     case BTN_Y:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_Y;
00453     case BTN_Z:         return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_Z;
00454     case BTN_RIGHT:     return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT;
00455     case BTN_LEFT:      return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT;
00456     case BTN_SELECT:    return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_SELECT;
00457     case BTN_START:     return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_START;
00458     case BTN_TRIGGER:   return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_TRIGGER;
00459   }
00460   return TELEOP_BUTTON_TYPE_UNKNOWN;
00461 }
00462 //=============================================================================
00463 std::string TeleopSourceJoystick::getDefaultDevice() {
00464   return std::string("/dev/input/js0");
00465 }
